code: import React from'react';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import Rating from'./Rating';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Product=function Product(_ref){var product=_ref.product;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"my-3 p-3 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{src:product.image,variant:"top"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{as:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:product.name})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{as:"div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{value:product.rating,text:"".concat(product.numReviews," reviews")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{as:"h3",children:["$",product.price]})]})]});};export default Product;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({ product }) => { return ( {product.name} ${product.price} ) } export default Product
